::Windlord::

"By all the hawks" said Windlord while he saw all Alliance troops 
ready to attak while he tried to be ready for tha most dangerous 
movement in his life "Windlord to Cibertronian Fire... be ready I'll 
try to do a difficult entry... this is my plan: count until twenty, 
open, the shields few seconds and put it up again... Trust me" 

"Primus, I beg you protection to her" thought the hawk

And he flew with high speed to Cibertron Fire that his body and 
Prime's gadet let him reaching all height that he needed for his plan


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::FZ/Lavacons/Perndabot/Repressor::
> 
> FZ looks at the Cybertronian Fire in the distance. Soon, there 
would 
> be battle.
> 
> "Alliance bots, spread out. When everyone is in position, we'll 
> attack," he orders over his comm, getting into position.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Recieving FZ's orders, and taking the bot as Zardus, Perndabot gets 
> into position.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Astral, Starlight, Griplash, Fenox, and Recklessa spread out along 
> with the others, out of range of the Cybertronian Fire's defences.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Repressor speeds up, heading toward the CF.
